rules_text: When Wilderness Forager enters the battlefield, you may reappropriate. If you do, you gain 6 life. Otherwise, you gain 3 life. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Is that a piece of an Angel mech? [/i]Good[i] boy. This'll trade for at least a week's worth of food—and plenty of bones for you.”[/i]
